title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Human Resource Development Practice Using 3D Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% task completion rates through human resource development simulations in a 3D game environment
Learners develop the competency to apply core human resource development theories (recruitment, training, evaluation) to real-world cases through gamification activities
Learners measure learning outcomes on a three-tier scale ('Average'-'Excellent'-'Outstanding') through peer and self-assessments during collaborative problem-solving processes

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
